name: KYou
description: With KYou, have a better knowledge of yourself.
author: Frank R <frank@cozycloud.cc>

Mail.description: Track the number of mails you receive.

Event.description: Track the number of events you had.

Task.description: Track the number of tasks you achieved.

RescueTimeActivity.description: Track time spent on productive apps/websites.

Steps.description: Track steps count from Jawbone data.

Sleep.description: Track sleep duration from Jawbone data.

TwitterTweet.description: Tracker the number of Tweets you published

Mood.description: Track your mood on a daily basis.

DailyNote.description: Small note to add details that can't be measured.

Weight.description: Weight data measure with SMB from Withings.

HeartBeat.description: Heart beat data measure from Withings objects.

BloodPressure.description: Blood pressure data measure from Withings objects.
